name: unmemorably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not likely to be remembered or worth remembering: After all the exciting games earlier, the season ended unmemorably with some uninspiring nil-nil draws. He found the long summer holidays unbearably boring, with one day blurring unmemorably into the next. Related word
unmemorable
More examplesFewer examplesOn the long train journey through Siberia, the bare countryside of birch trees and snow passed unmemorably by the window.The story ends, not unmemorably, with a scene on the clifftop.She was dressed very unmemorably - I think she had a cardigan on.
